title: [Discussion] are we supposed to carry this!?
content: Is this for labs , are we supposed to carry this or  its for our own use(to make notes)?

comments.body: U will be allowed to sit in certain classes only if ur using this to take down the notes
you will be barred from placements if you don't carry that /s
yes ofc, else how else can u flex your pride for PES?
u will be debarred from attending classes if u do not carry that book. Beware
